electronPdfService-sidebar-portlet-headi: Title of the portlet in which the link is shown.
electronPdfService-invalid-article-title: Used as title for the error message when specified page was not a valid article.
electronPdfService-invalid-article-text: Used as error message when specified page was not a valid article.
electronPdfService-article-notfound-titl: Used as title for the error message when Electron service was not able to resolve the given URL to the article.
electronPdfService-article-notfound-text: Used as error message when Electron service was not able to resolve the given URL to the article.
